## The Microsoft Save as PDF or XPS Add-in

If you are looking for an easy way to create and manage PDF or XPS files from your Microsoft Office documents, the Microsoft Save as PDF or XPS Add-in for 2017 Office software may be just what you need.

### What is the Microsoft Save as PDF or XPS Add-in?

The Microsoft Save as PDF or XPS Add-in is a software extension for Microsoft Office software including Word, Excel, and PowerPoint. It allows users to easily convert any Office document into a PDF or XPS file without having to use third-party applications.

### Benefits of using the Microsoft Save as PDF or XPS Add-in

#### 1. No need for third-party software

With the Microsoft Save as PDF or XPS Add-in, you no longer need to rely on other software to manage your PDF or XPS documents. This simplifies your document management process and reduces the risk of compatibility issues.

#### 2. Easy conversion process

The add-in makes it simple to convert your Office documents into PDF or XPS format. Just click the "Save as PDF" or "Save as XPS" button on the toolbar, and you can quickly create a new file.

#### 3. Improved accessibility

PDF and XPS files are widely used, making them more accessible to others who don't have access to Microsoft Office software. By using the Microsoft Save as PDF or XPS Add-in, you can ensure that your documents are easily accessible to all.

#### 4. Enhanced security

PDF and XPS files have a higher level of security than standard Office documents as they cannot be easily edited. By converting your Office documents to PDF or XPS format using the add-in, you can better protect the content of your documents and ensure confidentiality.

### How to install the Microsoft Save as PDF or XPS Add-in

If you have a 2017 version of Microsoft Office software, you can download and install the Microsoft Save as PDF or XPS Add-in for free from the Microsoft website. Once you have installed the add-in, you can simply click the "Save as PDF" or "Save as XPS" button in your toolbar to convert your document.

### Final Thoughts

The Microsoft Save as PDF or XPS Add-in is a valuable tool for anyone who needs to create and manage PDF or XPS files. It simplifies the conversion process, improves accessibility, enhances security, and eliminates the need for third-party software. So, if you're using Microsoft Office software, be sure to give this add-in a try!
